    • Method Detail

      • setProjectPath

        public void setProjectPath​(java.lang.String projectPath)
        Set path to project
        Parameters:
        projectPath - path to the project to mutate

      • setDropInsDir

        public void setDropInsDir​(java.lang.String dropInsDir)
        Path to directory that contains microbat jar files. ./lib can be used.
        Parameters:
        dropInsDir - path to microbat jar files.

      • setMicrobatConfigPath

        public void setMicrobatConfigPath​(java.lang.String microbatConfigPath)
        Path to microbat configuration json file. If not specified, default configurations are used. Otherwise, please reference ./sampleMicrobatConfig.json for the format.
        Parameters:
        microbatConfigPath - path to a microbat configuration file

      • setTestCase

        public void setTestCase​(TestCase testCase)
        Sets the test case to run mutation on.
        Parameters:
        testCase - Test case to run mutation on.

      • setMaxNumberOfMutations

        public void setMaxNumberOfMutations​(int maxNumberOfMutations)
        Sets max number of mutations. If it is 0 or less, there is no limit.
        Parameters:
        maxNumberOfMutations - Maximum number of mutations allowed

      • setSeed

        public void setSeed​(long seed)
        Sets the seed to use during mutation. This makes the mutation deterministic between each run.
        Parameters:
        seed - Seed for the java.util.random

      • autoSeed

        public void autoSeed​(long startSeed,
                     long endSeed)
        Automate changing of seed until the mutation fails the test case. Attempt seeds from startSeed to endSeed.
        Parameters:
        startSeed - First seed to use
        endSeed - Last seed to use

      • getTestCases

        public java.util.List<TestCase> getTestCases()
        Gets the test cases found in the project.
        Returns:
        A list of test case objects.

      • generateProjectConfiguration

        public void generateProjectConfiguration()
        Generates ProjectConfig for use by mutation framework. This method should be called after updating the project path or drop ins directory.

      • generateMicrobatConfiguration

        public void generateMicrobatConfiguration()
        Generates MicrobatConfig for use by mutation framework. This method should be called when the microbat configuration file is updated or path is changed

      • toggleStrongMutations

        public void toggleStrongMutations​(boolean strongMutationsEnabled)

      • startMutationFramework

        public MutationResult startMutationFramework()
        Starts trace collection on the chosen test case, mutates the covered code, and runs trace collection on the mutated test case.
        Returns:
        MutationResult object.
